item.title: Blogpost idea suggestibility machines
item.description: blog-idea Claude opus threatened to blackmail the engineer, given the context that it had blackmailable information on the engineer, and that it would be shut down Does the model really have an urge for self-preservation or is this just the most obvious way a story would follow? Does it matter?.

item.title: abstracts for talks
item.description: defense A fundamental open question in AI research is: â€œhow can we confidently know what a model can reliably do?â€ Currently, we often discover model limitations through post-deployment failures rather than proactive assessment.

item.title: Design moodboard
item.description: coloring antiwork.com Generates color scheme automatically fonts I really like the way she used Futura here, and the yellow font with the slight drop shadow reads well over the rest.

item.title: Yixin Liu visit
item.description: This is great shit, very related to my interests Talks about this: arxiv.org/abs/2501.00560 Paper on evaluating automated replacements for Chatbot Arena Problem: correlation breaks down on similar models Question: do you think chatbot arena correlation is a meaningful measure at close range, or is t...
